cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 36 keyboard shortcuts found in Airtable

cards.title: General
cards.back: Undo action

cards.title: General
cards.back: Redo action

cards.title: General
cards.back: Print the current table view or current expanded record (if inside an expanded record)

cards.title: General
cards.back: Opens the table switcher in the current base

cards.title: General
cards.back: Opens the quick base switcher if on the home screen or inside a base

cards.title: General
cards.back: Opens the view switcher in the current base

cards.title: General
cards.back: Opens the filter menu in the current view, press enter to create a new filter

cards.title: General
cards.back: Opens the grouped records menu in the current view, press enter to collapse or expand all groups

cards.title: General
cards.back: Opens the sort menu in the current view, press enter to re-apply the most recent sort

cards.title: General
cards.back: Toggles blocks

cards.title: General
cards.back: Opens the find bar, use esc to close it

cards.title: General
cards.back: Sets the selected date/datetime field to now

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Copy a cell or range of cells

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Cut a cell or range of cells

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Paste a cell (if you select a range of cells, you can paste the same value into multiple cells at once)

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Expand the active record, use esc to return to the table

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Expand the active cell, you can then use arrow keys to move to different cells

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Scrolls one screen up

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Scrolls one screen down

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Scrolls one screen left

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Scrolls one screen right

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Jump to the edge of the table

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Jump to the edge of table and select cells

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Select range of cells, you can also click while holding shift to select cells

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Insert a record below the selected cell

cards.title: Grid View
cards.back: Edit the selected cell

cards.title: Gallery View
cards.back: Scroll to edge of gallery

cards.title: Kanban View
cards.back: Scroll kanban board to the left by one stack

cards.title: Kanban View
cards.back: Scroll kanban board to the right by one stack

cards.title: Kanban View
cards.back: Scroll kanban board to the left edge

cards.title: Kanban View
cards.back: Scroll kanban board to the right edge

cards.title: Kanban View
cards.back: Scroll all stacks to the top

cards.title: Kanban View
cards.back: Scroll all stacks to the bottom

cards.title: Expanded Record
cards.back: Move to the previous record while viewing an expanded record

cards.title: Expanded Record
cards.back: Move to the next record while viewing an expanded record

cards.title: Expanded Record
cards.back: Close expanded record
